Navigation
Name Tutor/Markup/StructureMarkup/NewParagraph
Synopsis Introduce a new paragraph.
Description A new paragraph is created by two consecutive empty lines.
Examples The input:
line1
line2
empty line
empty line
line3
line4

will produce:

line1
line2

line3
line4
